sentence: The image is a screenshot from a blog post on "Ryanâs Blog on NMR Software."
sentence_cn: 该图是从“Ryan 的 NMR 软件博客”上的一篇博文中截取的截图。

sentence: The post is dated June 15, 2012, and the title is "NMR in the Movies? How to Secure a Date with Minnie Driver."
sentence_cn: 这篇帖子的发布日期是 2012 年 6 月 15 日，标题是“电影中的 NMR？如何与 Minnie Driver 约会。”
words: NMR in the Movies? How to Secure a Date with Minnie Driver.

sentence: The author writes about watching the movie "Good Will Hunting," which features actors Matt Damon and Robin Williams.
sentence_cn: 作者写了观看由马特·达蒙和罗宾·威廉姆斯主演的电影《心灵捕手》的经历。

sentence: The post includes an image from the film, showing the two actors smiling together.
sentence_cn: 该帖还附上了一张电影中的图片，照片中两位演员一起微笑。

sentence: Below the image, there's text discussing a scene where Matt Damon's character tries to ask Minnie Driver's character out on a date, but she declines because she needs to work on the \(^{1}\text{H}\) NMR spectrum of Ibogaine.
sentence_cn: 图片下方的文字讨论了这样一个场景：马特·达蒙 (Matt Damon) 的角色试图邀请米妮·德里弗 (Minnie Driver) 的角色约会，但她拒绝了，因为她需要研究伊博格碱 (Ibogaine) 的 \(^{1}\text{H}\) NMR 光谱。

sentence: A brief dialogue follows between characters Skylar and Will about this scientific task.
sentence_cn: 接下来，角色 Skylar 和 Will 之间就这项科学任务进行了简短的对话。

sentence: The blog has a sidebar with subscription options, links to categories like "1D NMR," "2D NMR," and more, and sections for "About" and "Who Am I?"
sentence_cn: 该博客有一个侧边栏，其中包含订阅选项、“1D NMR”、“2D NMR”等类别的链接以及“关于”和“我是谁？”部分。
